jobs.content: Specialising in front-end development with a focus on the React/Webpack mono-repo in Jira, particularly within Jira Service Management. I am actively involved in backend and operational work, collaborating on Java/Kotlin monoliths and micro-services deployed on AWS. My responsibilities include contributing to product features and bug fixes, participating in code reviews, mentoring junior team members, leading technical projects, and managing incidents with a 24/7 on-call roster.
